initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome to Lilycove Department Store! Here we have wool and dyes for your base items!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: We sell our wool in stacks of 16 for $1500. Would you like White Wool?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1500..}] run give @s minecraft:white_wool 16');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1500..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=1500..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 1500');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');
